mapper.insert: insert into board_qna( qnaTitle, qnaWriter, qnaCategoryD, qnaCategoryS, qnaContent, qnaRct, qnaRegdate, qnaType) values( #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaWriter}, #{qnaCategoryD}, #{qnaCategoryS}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaRct}, #{qnaRegdate}, #{qnaType})
mapper.select: select qnaBno, qnaType, qnaTitle, qnaWriter, qnaContent, qnaRegdate from board_qna where qnaBno = #{qnaBno}
mapper.update: update board_qna set qnaTitle =#{qnaTitle}, qnaContent =#{qnaContent} where qnaBno =#{qnaBno}
mapper.select: select qnaBno, qnaTitle, qnaContent, qnaWriter, qnaRegdate from board_qna where qnaBno > 0 order by qnaBno desc, qnaRegdate desc
select qnaBno, qnaTitle, qnaWriter, qnaContent, qnaRegdate, qnaType from board_qna where qnaBno > 0 order by qnaBno desc, qnaRegdate desc limit #{page},10
select qnaBno, qnaTitle, qnaWriter, qnaContent, qnaRegdate, qnaType from board_qna where qnaBno > 0 order by qnaBno desc, qnaRegdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(qnaBno) from board_qna where qnaBno > 0
